hit.binary: Content could not be displayed because the file is binary.
hit.empty: Content could not be displayed because the file is empty.

path.hints: Path of the file in the repository

examples.description: If you search for a word within a specific file
examples.explanation: queries all files with the name "README.md" for the word "ldap".

examples.description: Searching for a word in all files with either a specific extension or a specific filename
examples.explanation: queries all files with the extension "gradle" or with the filename "pom.xml" for the word "guava".
